channel.title: Manual on BulletGBA
channel.description: Recent content in Manual on BulletGBA

item.title: Buttons
item.description: Main Menu Button Function A Choose B Cancel Control Pad Move cursor In Game Button Function B Back to Main Menu R Skip to next barrage (You cannot skip in Shooting Mode) Start, Select Toggle slow mode Control Pad Move Show Mode You can toggle slow mode by START or SELECT. Bullets will be slowed down to 1/4 speed. The color of the bullets becomes purple. You need “Jewel” to enter slow mode.

item.title: Modes
item.description: Mode Description Select Barrage Select the barrage from the list Shooting Level 1-4 Destroy the boss BulletsMorph Generate the barrage automatically
